h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Head through the rest of the valley and deal with a Yaksha Patroller, which will lead to another rope bridge leading to a higher ledge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Head through the rest of the valley and deal with a Yaksha Patroller, which will lead to another rope bridge leading to a higher ledge.
